p: We recently published an article highlighting the special concerns while managing patients with diabetes in the times of severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2), the etiological agent of the (Corona Virus Disease 2019) COVID-19 pandemic [ 1]. More data has accumulated since then about this ever-evolving pandemic and several new concerns and concepts have emerged. We considered it worthwhile to highlight some of these issues and try to arrive at some rational conclusion based on the current evidence. Detailed articles on each of below mentioned issues will be published shortly.
